title: CaptionExchange
description: Real-time AI-human caption routing platform with distributed buffering and automatic failover for live broadcast delivery.
longDescription: Multi-tenant captioning platform supporting both AI/ASR and human captioners with intelligent routing, real-time buffer management, and automatic failover. Built with microservices architecture handling live broadcast operations with sub-second latency requirements.
metrics: Real-time caption routing with automatic failover

title: SLO Tracker
description: Serverless solution for automated SLO creation and alerting, improving system reliability visibility across engineering teams.
longDescription: Custom SLO tracking platform integrated with OpenTelemetry gateway stack. Teams define SLOs using alerts-as-code model, set error budgets, and receive automated breach notifications. Built with API-first design for scalability.

title: Ad Analytics Pipeline
description: Event-driven analytics pipeline enabling real-time ad performance tracking at scale for location-based gaming platforms.
longDescription: High-throughput data ingestion and analytics system processing terabytes of ad telemetry data daily. Built with event-driven microservices architecture using Cloud Pub/Sub for decoupled, scalable processing.

title: Chirp API
description: Production-ready REST API for user registration, authentication, voting, and relational data management with full CI/CD pipeline.
longDescription: Backend API demonstrating modern Python development practices including schema validation with Pydantic, SQLAlchemy ORM, Alembic migrations, and automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website built with Next.js, featuring dark mode and smooth animations.
longDescription: Production-grade portfolio showcasing modern web development practices with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
